name: Vengeful Race Truck
description: These are high-powered race Truck designed primarily for the purpose of racing. Take control of one of them and prove that you are the real racer But Winning the race was easy so now lets get into a real challenge.Demolition Derby Style Truck fighting However, the Truck you will be given is going to overcome any challenge with ease. You may choose either a peaceful way to finish or an aggressive one.
